## TxBuilder.setChangeAddress() method

Sets the change address for the transaction. This address will receive any remaining funds not allocated to outputs or fees.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setChangeAddress(address: Address, override?: boolean): TxBuilder;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

address


</td><td>

Address


</td><td>

The address to receive the change.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

override


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether to override the change address if one is already set.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[TxBuilder](./tx.txbuilder.md)

{<!-- -->TxBuilder<!-- -->} The same transaction builder
